tool_description:
Sports Open Data is a project started in June 2015 created by Paolo Riva, Riccardo Quatra and Fabio Sgroi.
This project was born by a need we've found when looking for statistics in Sports: no website offers its data in an Open Data way.
Sports Open Data will work in this way: by providing a JSON REST API, Sports Open Data allow you to manage data for every single match we've stored on our database.
And that's not over: Sports Open Data has been structured as an Open Organization: feel free to partecipate to our project or simply be part of our community to make it grow day by day. Open Data created by users for users.
name: Soccer - Sports Open Data
title: Soccer - Sports Open Data

api_list.name: Season Rounds
api_list.description: This API returns all the rounds available in a specified season

api_list.name: Season Details
api_list.description: With this API you could retrieve season details for a specified league. In result set you could find standings and rounds (if available)

api_list.name: List of Leagues
api_list.description: With this API you can retrieve all the leagues available on Soccer Sports Open Data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sportsop-soccer-sports-open-data-v1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/leagues"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sportsop-soccer-sports-open-data-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sportsop-soccer-sports-open-data-v1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/leagues"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Seasons Available
api_list.description: With this API you could retrieve which are the seasons available for a specified league

api_list.name: Season Standings
api_list.description: With this API you could retrieve season league standings for a specified league.

api_list.name: League Details
api_list.description: With this API you retrieve league details like identifier, slug, nation or federation

api_list.name: Season Standings Position
api_list.description: With this API you could retrieve data for a specific standings position. You've to add in request league_slug, season_slug and position

api_list.name: Season Specified Round
api_list.description: This API returns a specified round, with full details, for a specific season

api_list.name: Round Matches
api_list.description: This API returns matches available in a specified round. Every match has a full detail about events occurred.

api_list.name: Round Specified Match
api_list.description: This API returns full details information about a specified match in a round.

api_list.name: Season Teams Available
api_list.description: This API returns a list of teams available in a league during a season.

api_list.name: Stadiums List
api_list.description: This API returns a list of stadiums available.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sportsop-soccer-sports-open-data-v1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/stadiums"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sportsop-soccer-sports-open-data-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: League Top Scorer
api_list.description: With this API you're able to get top scorer of a specific league during a season

api_list.name: League Referee in season
api_list.description: This API returns a list of available referees in a season for a specified league.

api_list.name: League Managers in a Season for a Team
api_list.description: This API returns a list of managers for a specified team available in a league for a specified season.

api_list.name: Season Teams Available Players
api_list.description: With this API you can get all the player roster for a specified team in a league during a season.

api_list.name: Season Matches for a Team
api_list.description: Matches list for a team by searching it with Team Identifier (e.g. for Real Madrid is fw3ok0fty95tz0ydspi2g5yzghm5exdj)

api_list.name: Season Head 2 Head
api_list.description: Head 2 Head between two teams during a season

api_list.name: Events List
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sportsop-soccer-sports-open-data-v1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/utils/events"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sportsop-soccer-sports-open-data-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
